alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 07 at 4:31AM PST until February 07 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways that may be affected by gusty cross winds include Pacific Coast Highway.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
